    public class AllReportsView
extends android.support.v7.app.ActionBarActivity
implements StatusListener
    Since:
    2015-05-2015 The main activity for view all of the report currently in the local database

    1.0
    Author:
    Torgrim Bøe Skårsmoen

      • addItemClickListener

        private void addItemClickListener(ListView listView)
        Is called when one of the items in the list view is clicked. If this is a LocationReport or TextReport just the location or the location and the content of the report is shown. If the clicked item is a PhotoReport the user is taken to a separate image view
        Parameters:
        listView - The list view that holds the item that the has been clicked

        public void onCheckboxClicked(View view)
